diff_hunk:
@@ -427,44 +433,57 @@ def pad_to_bounding_box(image, offset_height, offset_width, target_height,
 
   Raises:
     ValueError: If the shape of `image` is incompatible with the `offset_*` or
-      `target_*` arguments
+      `target_*` arguments, or either `offset_height` or `offset_width` is
+      negative.
   """
   image = ops.convert_to_tensor(image, name='image')
-  _Check3DImage(image, require_static=True)
+  _Check3DImage(image, require_static=False)
   height, width, depth = _ImageDimensions(image)
 
-  if target_width < width:
-    raise ValueError('target_width must be >= width')
-  if target_height < height:
-    raise ValueError('target_height must be >= height')
-
   after_padding_width = target_width - offset_width - width
   after_padding_height = target_height - offset_height - height
 
-  if after_padding_width < 0:
+  if not isinstance(offset_height, ops.Tensor) and offset_height < 0:
body:
Solution 2 is not something that will happen right now (although constant folding does happen before execution)

How about making _is_tensor (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/framework/python/framework/tensor_util.py#L218) public and using that?

Solution 2 is not something that will happen right now (although constant folding does happen before execution)
How about making _is_tensor (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/framework/python/framework/tensor_util.py#L218) public and using that?
